Class AnimationQueue

java.lang.Object
dev.kkorolyov.pancake.core.component.AnimationQueue
All Implemented Interfaces:
dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.Debuggable, dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.entity.Component, Iterable<AnimationQueue.PlaybackConfig<TransformFrame>>
public final class AnimationQueue extends Object implements dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.entity.Component, Iterable<AnimationQueue.PlaybackConfig<TransformFrame>>
Emits TransformFrame diffs according to the current state.

      public AnimationQueue()

  • Method Details

    • add

      public void add(dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.animation.Timeline<TransformFrame> timeline, AnimationQueue.Type type)
      Adds animation timeline to this component, and preps it for type playback. timeline offsets are expected to be in ms.

    • update

      public TransformFrame update(long dt)
      Increments all playbacks by dt elapsed ns since the last call and returns the sum of each playback's frame difference. Return null if all playbacks return null. Does nothing and returns null if not isActive().

    • reset

      public TransformFrame reset()
      Resets all playbacks to their respective starts, and returns the sum of each playback's frame difference. Returns null if all playbacks return null.

    • clear

      public void clear()
      Removes all playbacks immediately without any additional termination / cleanup.

    • isActive

      public boolean isActive()
      Returns the current active state.

    • setActive

      public void setActive(boolean active)
      Sets the current `active` state.

    • iterator

      public Iterator<AnimationQueue.PlaybackConfig<TransformFrame>> iterator()
      Specified by:
      iterator in interface Iterable<AnimationQueue.PlaybackConfig<TransformFrame>>
